laboratory_examinations.findings: Weight: 5700g, Height: 65cm, Head circumference (PC): 42cm (SD: -3.54 for waist, -4.4 for weight, -3.25 for cranial perimeter)
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased weight to 12.3kg, height to 91cm, PC to 47cm at 4 years; later increased to 47kg, 148cm, and PC 51 at 16 years.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Normal EEG in both awake and drowsy states; no seizure activity present.
Relative shortness of tubular bones, especially of distal and middle phalanges.

laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: FISH analysis at 4 years revealed a 65% percent mosaic 4p16.3 deletion.
